replies.trivia_ask_question_number: At what question would you like to start?
replies.trivia_inform_answer_correct_ask_next: Your answer was correct! Great job! Would you like to continue playing?
replies.trivia_inform_answer_incorrect_ask_next:
Unfortunately your answer was wrong. '{answer:s}' would have been correct.
Would you like to continue playing?
replies.trivia_inform_answer_2_ask_next: The answer to this question would have been '{answer:s}'. Would you like to continue playing?
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.trivia_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no questions that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to play trivia with you.
